mapper.insert: insert into t_sys_resource(id, rescode, resname, icon, res_url, res_type, order_by, parent_id, enabled, description) values ( #{id}, #{rescode}, #{resname}, #{icon}, #{resUrl}, #{resType}, #{orderBy}, #{parentId}, #{enabled}, #{description} )
mapper.update: update t_sys_resource set rescode = #{rescode}, resname = #{resname}, icon = #{icon}, res_url = #{resUrl}, res_type = #{resType}, order_by = #{orderBy}, parent_id = #{parentId}, enabled = #{enabled}, description = #{description}, version = version + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as Id, rescode as Rescode, resname as Resname, icon as Icon, res_url as ResUrl, res_type as ResType, order_by as OrderBy, parent_id as ParentId, enabled as Enabled, description as Description, version as Version from t_sys_resource where id = #{id}
